review: At first I was going to give it 5 starts but I wanted to test it out a while. I'm a loyal customer of amazon but this stick can be very fustrating. I have a Google Chrome and a roku stick, according to the specs of the Amazon fire stick it should beat both other devices yet I have the most issues with the Fire Stick. Besides Netflix, most tv and movie apps buffer way to much. Now I will mention I have a big house but if the chromecast and roku work perfectly at the same location so should the fire stick.As for the layout and functionality Amazon provides a nice operating system and layout but it is catered to people who use Amazon's products. I think if you want something to run well and you are on a budget, get chromecast or roku stick but if you have $100 to buy the actual Amazon Fire TV definitely go with that... but leaves it's lower end stick alone.
